title: Bookmarks not showing in New Tab
content: I selected the option "Only Show In New Tab" for the bookmarks toolbar, but it doesn't seem to be working when I open a new tab. Is there something I could do to fix it?
creator: ovinibortoletto

title: Firefox won't start even in Safe Mode
